All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockPatternBuilder
    Used to construct an IBlockPattern.
    ConstantGuiTextures  
    ConstantMetaTileEntities  
    ConstantMoveType  
    ConstantMultiblockAbility  
    ConstantRelativeDirection  
    ConstantTextures  
    CustomMultiblock
    A representation of a custom GregTech Multiblock.
    CustomMultiblockBracketHandler
    A bracket handler for getting a custom multiblock.
    ExpandBlock  
    ExpandRecipe  
    ExpandState  
    IBlockInfo
    This is used to define what block should show in the JEI preview.
    IBlockMatcher
    Used by an IBlockPattern to decide whether the placement of a block is valid.
    IBlockPattern
    This is what defines the required structure of a multiblock
    IBlockWorldState
    Similar to an IBlockState, but bound to a position and world, and holding extra information about the match taking place.
    ICompleteRecipeFunction
    Called every time a recipe completes.
    IControllerTile  
    IDisplayTextFunction
    Called when adding text to the multiblock UI.
    IFormStructureFunction
    Called when the multiblock is formed.
    IICubeRenderer
    Used in MultiblockBuilder.withTexture(IICubeRenderer) to set the texture of the controller, and that of all the components, when the multiblock forms.
    IIEnergyContainer  
    IIFluidTank
    Used for interacting with fluid tanks.
    IIItemHandlerModifiable
    Used for interacting with inventories.
    IIMultipleTankHandler
    Used for interacting with multiple fluid tanks.
    IMatchValidator
    Can be used for matching either a layer, or the whole multiblock.
    IMetaTileEntity
    A GregTech meta tile entity.
    IMultiblockAbility
    An ability that a multiblock may have, such as fluid import/export, or item import/export.
    IMultiblockShapeInfo
    Represents an example structure for a multiblock, shown in JEI or as an in-world preview.
    IPatternMatchContext
    The context of a match.
    IRecipe
    A constructed GregTech recipe, with details about inputs, outputs, or custom properties.
    IRecipeLogic
    Used to perform the recipe logic.
    IRecipePredicate
    Called before a recipe is chosen.
    IRemovalFunction
    Called when the controller block is about to be removed.
    ISetupRecipeFunction
    Called whenever the worktable sets up for a new recipe.
    ITextureArea
    Can be used for defining a custom recipe arrow.
    IUpdateFunction
    Called every time the worktable updates.
    IUpdateWorktableFunction
    A function run when the worktable is updated, that is, every tick.
    MetaStateBracketHandler
    A bracket handler for getting an IBlockState by metadata.
    MultiblockBuilder
    The Builder, or Multiblock Builder, is used to define a custom CustomMultiblock.
    MultiblockRegistry
    An alternative way to get a CustomMultiblock from its metadata or ID.
    MultiblockShapeInfoBuilder
    Used to create a design to show in JEI or as an in-world preview.
    RecipeMapBuilder
    Used for RecipeMap creation.
